WorkItem.Description:
There is a duplicate of the Elixir of Deep Earth mixology instead of Master mixology, at least under Bear (not sure if these are shared or not).
 
Also per prior conversation I totally get a higher rating with two elixirs than the flask even without master mixology.  So I'm very glad this was added.  Now I know for sure to switch.  
 
Though honestly AGI scroll plus deep earth may be better but scrolls are also still bugged (see re-opened other ticket).
 
Some of the old elixirs that have obviously upgraded versions can probably be removed (i.e. elixir of accuracy) to shorten/clean up the list a bit.  It's rather long.

Comments.Message: The improved was typo'd as 'Deep Earth' instead of 'the Master'. Fixed by commit 57059
